cards.name: Architects' Guild
cards.description: When you gain a card, you may spend 2 Favors to gain a cheaper non-Victory card.

cards.name: Band of Nomads
cards.description: When you gain a card costing $3 or more, you may spend a Favor, for +1 Card, or +1 Action, or +1 Buy.

cards.name: Cave Dwellers
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may spend a Favor, to discard a card then draw a card. Repeat as desired.

cards.name: Circle of Witches
cards.description: After playing a Liaison, you may spend 3 Favors to have each other player gain a Curse.

cards.name: City-State
cards.description: When you gain an Action card, during your turn, you may spend 2 Favors to play it.

cards.name: Coastal Haven
cards.description: When discarding your hand in Clean-up, you may spend any number of Favors to keep that many cards in hand for next turn (you still draw 5).

cards.name: Crafters' Guild
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may spend 2 Favors to gain a card costing up to $4 onto your deck.

cards.name: Desert Guides
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may spend a Favor to discard your hand and draw 5 Cards. Repeat as desired.

cards.name: Family of Inventors
cards.description: At the start of your Buy phase, you may put a Favor token you have on a non-Victory Supply pile. Cards cost $1 less per Favor token on their piles.

cards.name: Fellowship of Scribes
cards.description: After playing an Action, if you have 4 or fewer cards in hand, you may spend a Favor for +1 Card.

cards.name: Forest Dwellers
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may spend a Favor to look at the top 3 cards of your deck, discard any number, and put the rest back in any order

cards.name: Gang of Pickpockets
cards.description: At the start of your turn, discard down to 4 cards in hand unless you spend a Favor.

cards.name: Island Folk
cards.description: At the end of your turn, if the previous turn wasn't yours, you may spend 5 Favors to take another turn.

cards.name: League of Bankers
cards.description: At the start of your Buy phase, +$1 per 4 Favors you have (rounded down).

cards.name: League of Shopkeepers
cards.description: After playing a Liaison, if you have 5 or more Favors, +$1, and if 10 or more, +1 Action and +1 Buy.

cards.name: Market Towns
cards.description: At the start of your Buy phase, you may spend a Favor to play an Action card from your hand. Repeat as desired.

cards.name: Mountain Folk
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may spend 5 Favors for +3 Cards.

cards.name: Order of Astrologers
cards.description: When shuffling, you may pick one card per Favor you spend to go on top.

cards.name: Order of Masons
cards.description: When shuffling, you may pick up to 2 cards per Favor you spend to put it into your discard pile.

cards.name: Peaceful Cult
cards.description: At the start of your Buy phase, you may spend any number of Favors to trash that many cards from your hand.

cards.name: Plateau Shepherds
cards.description: When scoring, pair up your Favors with cards you have costing $2, for 2VP per pair.

cards.name: Trappers' Lodge
cards.description: When you gain a card, you may spend a Favor to put it onto your deck.

cards.name: Woodworkers' Guild
cards.description: At the start of your Buy phase, you may spend a Favor to trash an Action card from your hand. If you did, gain an Action card.

cards.name: Herb Gatherer
cards.description:
+1 Buy
Put your deck into your discard pile. Look through it and you may play a Treasure from it.
You may rotate the Augurs

cards.name: Acolyte
cards.description:
You may trash an Action or Victory card from your hand to gain a Gold.
You may trash this to gain an Augur.

cards.name: Sorceress
cards.description:
+1 Action
Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand.
If it's the named card, each other player gains a Curse.

cards.name: Sibyl
cards.description:
+4 Cards
+1 Action
Put a card from your hand on the top of your deck, and another on the bottom.

cards.name: Battle Plan
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
You may reveal an Attack card from your hand for +1 Card.
You may rotate any Supply pile.

cards.name: Archer
cards.description:
+$2
Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals all but one, and discards one of them that you choose.

cards.name: Warlord
cards.description:
+1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards. Until then, other players can't play an Action from their hand that they have 2 or more copies of in play.

cards.name: Territory
cards.description:
Worth 1VP per differently named Victory card you have.
----------
When you gain this, gain a Gold per empty Supply pile.

cards.name: Tent
cards.description:
+$2
You may rotate the Forts.
----------
When you discard this from play, you may put it onto your deck.

cards.name: Garrison
cards.description:
+$2
This turn, when you gain a card, add a token here. At the start of your next turn, remove them for +1 Card each.

cards.name: Hill Fort
cards.description: Gain a card costing up to $4. Choose one: Put it into your hand; or +1 Card and +1 Action.

cards.name: Stronghold
cards.description:
Choose one; +$3; or at the start of your next turn, +3 Cards.
----------
Worth 2VP

cards.name: Bauble
Sycophant
cards.description:
+1 Action
Discard 3 cards. If you discarded at least one, +$3
----------
When you gain or trash this card, +2 Favors

cards.name: Townsfolk
cards.description: This pile starts the game with 4 copies each of Town Crier, Blacksmith, Miller, and Elder, in that order. Only the top card can be gained or bought.

cards.name: Augurs
cards.description: This pile starts the game with 4 copies each of Herb Gatherer, Acolyte, Sorceress, and Sibyl, in that order. Only the top card can ge gained or bought.

cards.name: Clashes
cards.description: This pile starts the game with 4 copies each of Battle Plan, Archer, Warlord, and Territory, in that order. Only the top card can ge gained or bought.

cards.name: Forts
cards.description: This pile starts the game with 4 copies each of Tent, Garrison, Hill Fort, and Stronghold, in that order. Only the top card can ge gained or bought.

cards.name: Importer
cards.description:
At the start of your next turn, gain a card costing up to $5.
----------
Setup: Each player gets +4 Favors

cards.name: Merchant Camp
cards.description:
+2 Actions
+$1
----------
When you discard this from play, you may put it onto your deck.

cards.name: Odysseys
cards.description: This pile starts the game with 4 copies each of Old Map, Voyage, Sunken Treasure, and Distant Shore, in that order. Only the top card can ge gained or bought.

cards.name: Sentinel
cards.description: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may trash up to 2 of them. Put the rest back in any order.

cards.name: Underling
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Favor

cards.name: Wizards
cards.description: This pile starts the game with 4 copies each of Student, Conjurer, Sorcerer, and Lich, in that order. Only the top card can ge gained or bought.

cards.name: Broker
Carpenter
cards.description:
If no Supply piles are empty, +1 Action and gain a card costing up to $4.
Otherwise, trash a card from your hand and gain a card costing up to $2 more than it.

cards.name: Courier
cards.description:
+$1
Discard the top card of your deck. Look through your discard pile; you may plan an Action or Treasure from it.

cards.name: Innkeeper
cards.description:
+1 Action
Choose one; +1 Card; or +3 Cards, then discard 3 cards; or +5 Cards then discard 6 cards.

cards.name: Royal Galley
cards.description:
+1 Card
You may play a non-Duration Action card from your hand.
Set it aside; if you did, then at the start of your next turn, play it.

cards.name: Town
Barbarian
cards.description:
+$2
Each other player trashes the top card of their deck. If it costs $3 or more they gain a cheaper card sharing a type with it; otherwise they gain a Curse.

cards.name: Capital City
cards.description:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
You may discard 2 cards for $2.
You may pay $2 for +2 cards.

cards.name: Contract
cards.description:
Worth $2
+1 Favor
You may set aside an Action from your hand to play it at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Emissary
cards.description:
+3 Cards
If this made you shuffle (at least one card), +1 Action and +2 Favors.

cards.name: Galleria
cards.description:
+$3
This turn, when you gain a card costing $3 or $4, +1 Buy.

cards.name: Guildmaster
cards.description:
+$3
This turn, when you gain a card, +1 Favor.

cards.name: Highwayman
cards.description:
At the start of your next turn, discard this from play and +3 Cards.
Until then, the first treasure each other plays each turn does nothing.

cards.name: Hunter
cards.description:
+1 Action
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From those cards, put an Action, a Treasure, and a Victory card into your hand. Discard the rest.

cards.name: Modify
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. Choose one: +1 Card and +1 Action; or gain a card costing up to $2 more than the trashed card.

cards.name: Skirmisher
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
This turn, when you gain an Attack card, each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.

cards.name: Specialist
cards.description: You may play an Action or Treasure from your hand. Choose one: Play it again; or gain a copy of it.

cards.name: Swap
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
You may return an Action from your hand to its pile, to gain to your hand a different action costing up to $5.

cards.name: Marquis
cards.description:
+1 Buy
+1 Card per card in your hand. Discard down to 10 cards in hand.

cards.name: Old Map
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Discard a card. +1 Card.
You may rotate the Odysseys.

cards.name: Voyage
cards.description:
+1 Action
If the previous turn wasn't yours, take an extra turn after this one, during which you can only play 3 cards from your hand.

cards.name: Sunken Treasure
cards.description:
Worth $0
Gain an Action card you don't have a copy of in play.

cards.name: Distant Shore
cards.description:
+2 Cards
+1 Action
Gain an Estate
----------
Worth 2VP

cards.name: Town Crier
cards.description:
Choose one: +$2; or gain a Silver; or +1 Card and +1 Action.
You may rotate the Townsfolk.

cards.name: Blacksmith
cards.description:
Choose one:
Draw until you have 6 cards in hand; or +2 Cards; or +1 Card and +1 Action.

cards.name: Miller
cards.description:
+1 Action
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and discard the rest.

cards.name: Elder
cards.description:
+$2
You may play an Action card from your hand. When it gives you a choice of abilities (e.g. "choose one") this turn, you may choose an extra (different) option.

cards.name: Student
cards.description:
+1 Action
You may rotate the Wizards.
Trash a card from your hand. If it's a Treasure, +1 Favor and put this onto your deck.

cards.name: Conjurer
cards.description:
Gain a card costing up to $4.
At the start of your next turn, put this into your hand.

cards.name: Sorcerer
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Each other player names a card, then reveals the top card of their deck. If wrong, they gain a Curse.

cards.name: Lich
cards.description:
+6 Cards
+2 Actions
Skip a turn
----------
When you trash this card, discard it and gain a cheaper card from the trash.
